trans-unit.target: -or- key is .

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the keys in the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>contenente le chiavi di <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Values%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine delle chiavi nel <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>non è specificato, ma è stesso ordine dei valori associati nel <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>restituito dal <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Values%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the keys in the original <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>non è una copia statica, bensì <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>fa riferimento alle chiavi nell'originale <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> continue to be reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Modifiche <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>apportate in <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Il recupero del valore di questa proprietà è un'operazione o (1).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the keys in the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>contenente le chiavi di <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and raises the deserialization event when the deserialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"> </xref> l'interfaccia e genera l'evento di deserializzazione quando la deserializzazione è completa.

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è un'operazione O (`n`) operazione, in cui `n` è <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because serializing and deserializing an enumerator for a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> can cause the elements to become reordered, it is not possible to continue enumeration without calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Poiché la serializzazione e deserializzazione di un enumeratore per un <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>può causare i riordinamento degli elementi, non è possibile continuare l'enumerazione senza chiamare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The source of the deserialization event.
trans-unit.target: Origine dell'evento di deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> non è valido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the element with the specified key from the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'elemento con la chiave specificata dal <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> does not contain an element with the specified key, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>non contiene un elemento con la chiave specificata, il <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>rimane invariato.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata alcuna eccezione.

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è un'operazione o (1).

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: Chiave dell'elemento da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - o - <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: Returns a synchronized (thread-safe) wrapper for the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un wrapper sincronizzato (thread-safe) per il <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Synchronized method is thread safe for multiple readers and writers.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo sincronizzato è thread-safe per più lettori e writer.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, the synchronized wrapper ensures that there is only one writer writing at a time.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il wrapper sincronizzato assicura che sia presente un solo writer, la scrittura in un momento.

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.collections.has_11_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.collections.has_11_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.collections.has_11_1.cs)] This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come bloccare la raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.SyncRoot%2A>durante l'intera enumerazione: [!code-cpp [classico Hashtable.IsSynchronized esempio n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.collections.has_11_1.cpp)][!code-vb[classico Hashtable.IsSynchronized esempio n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.collections.has_11_1.vb)][!code-cs[classico Hashtable.IsSynchronized esempio n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.collections.has_11_1.cs) ] questo metodo è un'operazione o (1). </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> to synchronize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> per la sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A synchronized (thread-safe) wrapper for the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sincronizzato (thread-safe) wrapper per il <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To create a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, use the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Synchronized%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una versione sincronizzata del <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Synchronized%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Synchronized%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, le classi derivate possono fornire una propria versione sincronizzata del <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>utilizzando la proprietà SyncRoot.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> .
trans-unit.target: Il codice di sincronizzazione deve essere eseguite nella radice di sincronizzazione del <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, non direttamente sulla <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo si garantisce il corretto funzionamento delle raccolte derivate da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, viene mantenuta la sincronizzazione con altri thread che potrebbero modificare contemporaneamente il <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>oggetto.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the SyncRoot during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.collections.has_0_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.collections.has_0_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.collections.has_0_1.cs)]
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come bloccare la raccolta utilizzando SyncRoot durante l'intera enumerazione: [!code-cpp [classico Hashtable.IsSynchronized esempio n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.collections.has_0_1.cpp)][!code-vb[classico Hashtable.IsSynchronized esempio n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.collections.has_0_1.vb)][!code-cs[classico Hashtable.IsSynchronized esempio n.&2; ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.collections.has_0_1.cs)]

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che scorre una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] Il `foreach` istruzione del linguaggio c# (`for each` in Visual Basic) nasconde la complessità degli enumeratori.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, l'utilizzo `foreach` è consigliabile, anziché la modifica diretta dell'enumeratore.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare enumeratori per leggere i dati nella raccolta, ma non possono essere utilizzati per modificare la raccolta sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente l'enumeratore è posizionato prima del primo elemento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>riporta l'enumeratore in questa posizione.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: In questa posizione, la chiamata <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, è necessario chiamare <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>per passare l'enumeratore al primo elemento della raccolta prima di leggere il valore di <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>Restituisce lo stesso oggetto finché non <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>imposta <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>all'elemento successivo.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>raggiunge la fine della raccolta, l'enumeratore è posizionato dopo l'ultimo elemento nella raccolta e <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>restituisce `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'enumeratore si trova in questa posizione, le chiamate successive a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>restituire anche `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se l'ultima chiamata a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>restituito `false`, la chiamata <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>il primo elemento della raccolta, è possibile chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>seguito dal <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Un enumeratore rimane valido fino a quando la raccolta rimane invariata.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator can be invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono apportate modifiche alla raccolta, ad esempio aggiungendo, modificando o eliminando elementi, l'enumeratore può essere invalidato e la successiva chiamata a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>Genera un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: Se la raccolta viene modificata tra <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>e <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>restituisce l'elemento su cui è stata impostata, anche se l'enumeratore risulta già invalidato.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore non dispone di accesso esclusivo alla raccolta. Pertanto, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è un'operazione o (1).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>che può essere utilizzato per scorrere la raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the values in the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>contenente i valori di <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Keys%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine dei valori nel <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>non è specificato, ma è lo stesso ordine delle chiavi associate nel <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>restituito dal <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Keys%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the values in the original <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>non è una copia statica, bensì <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>fa riferimento ai valori dell'originale <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> continue to be reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Modifiche <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>apportate in <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Il recupero del valore di questa proprietà è un'operazione o (1).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the values in the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>contenente i valori di <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
